original_text: There was Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal and Mattaniah, the son of Mica and grandson of Zikri, who was a descendant of Asaph.
korean_text: 또 박박갈과 헤레스와 갈랄과 맛다냐이니 그는 미가의 아들이요 시그리의 손자요 아삽의 증손이며

sentences.original_text: There was Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal and Mattaniah
who was a descendant of Asaph
